hints.title: LSI for Companion-Dependent Geometric Gas
hints.content:
4955: :label: conj-lsi-companion-dependent-full
4956: 
4957: We conjecture that under the assumptions of {prf:ref}`thm-main-complete-cinf-geometric-gas-full`, the Geometric Gas satisfies a **Logarithmic Sobolev Inequality** with constant $\alpha > 0$:
4958: 
4959: $$
4960: \text{Ent}_\mu(\rho) \leq \frac{1}{\alpha} \mathcal{E}(\rho, \rho)
4961: 
4962: $$
4963: 
4964: where:
4965: - $\text{Ent}_\mu(\rho) = \int \rho \log(\rho/\mu) d\mu$ (relative entropy)
4966: - $\mathcal{E}(\rho, \rho) = -\int \rho \mathcal{L}_{\text{geo}} \log \rho \, d\mu$ (Dirichlet form)

4956:

4958:

4960: \text{Ent}_\mu(\rho) \leq \frac{1}{\alpha} \mathcal{E}(\rho, \rho)
4961:

4966: - $\mathcal{E}(\rho, \rho) = -\int \rho \mathcal{L}_{\text{geo}} \log \rho \, d\mu$ (Dirichlet form)

hints.label: cor-exponential-qsd-companion-dependent-full
hints.title: Exponential Convergence to QSD (Conditional)
hints.content:
5025: :label: cor-exponential-qsd-companion-dependent-full
5026: 
5027: **If** {prf:ref}`conj-lsi-companion-dependent-full` holds, then the Geometric Gas with companion-dependent fitness converges exponentially to its unique quasi-stationary distribution:
5028: 
5029: $$
5030: \|\rho_t - \nu_{\text{QSD}}\|_{L^2(\mu)} \leq e^{-\lambda_{\text{gap}} t} \|\rho_0 - \nu_{\text{QSD}}\|_{L^2(\mu)}
5031: 
5032: $$
5033: 
5034: where $\lambda_{\text{gap}} \geq \alpha > 0$ is the **spectral gap**, independent of $N$ and $k$.
